Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
14.16.1 Spatial Function Reference
Description: Return number of geometries in geometry collection

Returns the number of geometries in the
            GeometryCollection value
            gc.

ST_NumGeometries() handles
            its arguments as described in the introduction to this
            section.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SET @gc = 'GeometryCollection(Point(1 1),LineString(2 2, 3 3))';
mysql> SELECT ST_NumGeometries(ST_GeomFromText(@gc));
+----------------------------------------+
| ST_NumGeometries(ST_GeomFromText(@gc)) |
+----------------------------------------+
|                                      2 |
+----------------------------------------+
Examples:
mysql> SET @gc = 'GeometryCollection(Point(1 1),LineString(2 2, 3 3))';
mysql> SELECT ST_NumGeometries(ST_GeomFromText(@gc));
+----------------------------------------+
| ST_NumGeometries(ST_GeomFromText(@gc)) |
+----------------------------------------+
|                                      2 |
+----------------------------------------+
